Detailed Description

Function Documentation

◆ dsa_get_analog_input_a()

int dsa_get_analog_input_a ( DSA_DRIVE *  obj,
int  kind,
DSA_DOUBLE_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Get the analog input (MF51) - asynchronous.

Available on VHP ONLY.

Parameters
objthe object pointer
kindthe kind of value to retrieve
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
handlerthe handler function called when the value is get
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_get_analog_input_s()

int dsa_get_analog_input_s ( DSA_DRIVE *  obj,
double *  inp,
int  kind,
long  timeout 
)

Get the analog input (MF51) - synchronous.

Available on VHP ONLY.

Parameters
objthe drive pointer
inpa pointer to the double register which will receive the analog input value in V
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error

◆ dsa_get_analog_output_s()

int dsa_get_analog_output_s ( DSA_DRIVE *  obj,
double *  out,
int  kind,
long  timeout 
)

Get the analog output (C107 or CF107) - synchronous.

Available on VHP ONLY.

Parameters
objthe drive pointer
outa pointer to the double register which will receive the analog output value in V
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_get_digital_input_a()

int  kind,
DSA_DWORD_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Get the digital inputs (M50) - asynchronous.

Parameters
objthe object pointer
kindthe kind of value to retrieve
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
handlerthe handler function called when the value is get
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed

dword *  inp,
int  kind,
long  timeout 
)

Get the digital inputs (M50) - synchronous.

Parameters
objthe drive pointer
inpa pointer to the dword register which will receive the digital inputs value
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet

dword *  mask,
int  kind,
long  timeout 
)

Get the error output mask (K357:0) - synchronous.

Parameters
drvthe object pointer
maska pointer on the variable which will receive the output mask (bits 0..15: output reset, bit 16..31: output set)
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured

DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_get_fast_digital_output_a()

int dsa_get_fast_digital_output_a ( DSA_DRIVE *  obj,
int  kind,
DSA_DWORD_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Get the fast digital outputs (C5) - asynchronous.

Parameters
objthe object pointer
kindthe kind of value to retrieve
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
handlerthe handler function called when the value is get
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_get_fast_digital_output_s()

int dsa_get_fast_digital_output_s ( DSA_DRIVE *  obj,
dword *  out,
int  kind,
long  timeout 
)

Get the fast digital outputs (C5) - synchronous.

Parameters
objthe drive pointer
outa pointer to the dword register which will receive the fast digital outputs value
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

)

grpthe object pointer

handlerthe handler function called when the value is set
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_set_fast_digital_output_s()

int dsa_set_fast_digital_output_s ( DSA_DRIVE_BASE *  obj,
dword  out,
long  timeout 
)

Set the fast digital outputs (C5) - synchronous.

Parameters
objthe object pointer
outthe fast digital outputs value
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured

DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet

)

int  start_line,
int  line_nb,
ebool  ereport,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Enable the 2D trigger (Command:TRM2D) - asynchronous.

Deprecated:
since EDI-4.24A. Use dsa_trigger2d_enable_ex_a instead.
Can only be used on FW >= 3.10.
Parameters
grpthe object pointer
start_linethe starting line of event table
line_nbthe number of line to enable
  • -1 an infinite number of line (continuous trigger)
ereportTRUE if the function must return an error on drive error
handlerthe handler function called when the trigger is enable
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured

)

start_linethe starting line of event table

  • -1 an infinite number of line (continuous trigger)

ereportTRUE if the function must return an error on drive error

a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured

◆ dsa_trigger2d_get_box_tolerance_a()

int dsa_trigger2d_get_box_tolerance_a ( DSA_DRIVE *  drv,
int  kind,
DSA_DOUBLE_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Get the 2D trigger box tolerance in ISO (m or t) (K338) - asynchronous.

Warning: The tolerance is given in ISO units (m or t). EDI will use the destination axis to convert this position in increments. If the position is a position referrencing another axis than the destination one, you must convert the ISO position in increments and use dsa_trigger2d_get_box_tolerance_increment_a instead

Parameters
drvthe object pointer
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
handlerthe handler function called when the value is get
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_trigger2d_get_box_tolerance_increment_a()

int dsa_trigger2d_get_box_tolerance_increment_a ( DSA_DRIVE *  drv,
int  kind,
DSA_INT_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Get the 2D trigger box tolerance in INCREMENT (K338) - asynchronous.

Warning: The tolerance is returned in INCREMENTS. This function must be used if the tolerance is a tolerance referrencing another axis than the destination one. Otherwise, you can use use dsa_trigger2d_get_box_tolerance_a an give the tolerance in ISO units (m or t)

Parameters
drvthe object pointer
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
handlerthe handler function called when the value is get
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found

DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete

DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error

◆ dsa_trigger2d_get_box_tolerance_increment_s()

int dsa_trigger2d_get_box_tolerance_increment_s ( DSA_DRIVE *  drv,
int *  tolerance,
int  kind,
long  timeout 
)

Get the 2D trigger box tolerance in INCREMENT (K338) - synchronous.

Warning: The tolerance is returned in INCREMENTS. This function must be used if the tolerance is a tolerance referrencing another axis than the destination one. Otherwise, you can use use dsa_trigger2d_get_box_tolerance_s an give the tolerance in ISO units (m or t)

Parameters
drvthe object pointer
tolerancea pointer on the variable which will receive the box tolerance in INCREMENT
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet

DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed

DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error

DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available

◆ dsa_trigger2d_get_box_tolerance_s()

int dsa_trigger2d_get_box_tolerance_s ( DSA_DRIVE *  drv,
double *  tolerance,
int  kind,
long  timeout 
)

Get the 2D trigger box tolerance in ISO (m or t) (K338) - synchronous.

Warning: The tolerance is given in ISO units (m or t). EDI will use the destination axis to convert this position in increments. If the position is a position referrencing another axis than the destination one, you must convert the ISO position in increments and use dsa_trigger2d_get_box_tolerance_increment_s instead

Parameters
drvthe object pointer
tolerancea pointer on the variable which will receive the box tolerance in ISO (m or t)
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_trigger2d_set_box_tolerance_a()

int dsa_trigger2d_set_box_tolerance_a ( DSA_DRIVE_BASE *  grp,
double  tolerance,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Set the 2D trigger box tolerance in ISO (m or t) (K338) - asynchronous.

Warning: The tolerance is given in ISO units (m or t). EDI will use the destination axis to convert this position in increments. If the position is a position referrencing another axis than the destination one, you must convert the ISO position in increments and use dsa_trigger2d_set_box_tolerance_increment_a instead

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
tolerancethe tolerance in ISO (m or t) to apply to ELx:0.(axis)
handlerthe handler function called when the value is set
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_trigger_continuous_last_event_loaded_a()

int dsa_trigger_continuous_last_event_loaded_a ( DSA_DRIVE_BASE *  grp,
ebool  ereport,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Last event loaded of continuous trigger mode (Command:TRM=-255) - asynchronous.

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
ereportTRUE if the function must return an error on drive error
handlerthe handler function called when the trigger is disabled
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered

DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group

DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state

DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool

DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_trigger_disable_a()

int dsa_trigger_disable_a ( DSA_DRIVE_BASE *  grp,
ebool  moving,
ebool  ereport,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Disable the trigger (Command:TRM / TRE) - asynchronous.

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
movingthe mode of the trigger
  • DSA_TRIGGER_MOVING disable the trigger for moving state
  • DSA_TRIGGER_NOT_MOVING disable the trigger for NOT-moving state
ereportTRUE if the function must return an error on drive error
handlerthe handler function called when the trigger is disabled
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

ebool  moving,
ebool  ereport,
long  timeout 
)

Disable the trigger (Command:TRM / TRE) - synchronous.

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
movingthe mode of the trigger
  • DSA_TRIGGER_MOVING disable the trigger for moving state
  • DSA_TRIGGER_NOT_MOVING disable the trigger for NOT-moving state
ereportTRUE if the function must return an error on drive error
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet

int  start_line,
int  line_nb,

)

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
movingthe mode of the trigger
  • DSA_TRIGGER_MOVING enable the trigger for moving state
  • DSA_TRIGGER_NOT_MOVING enable the trigger for NOT-moving state
start_linethe starting line of event table
line_nbthe number of line to enable
  • -1 an infinite number of line (continuous trigger)
ereportTRUE if the function must return an error on drive error
handlerthe handler function called when the trigger is enable
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured

)

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
movingthe mode of the trigger
  • DSA_TRIGGER_MOVING enable the trigger for moving state
  • DSA_TRIGGER_NOT_MOVING enable the trigger for NOT-moving state

line_nbthe number of line to enable
  • -1 an infinite number of line (continuous trigger)
missed_event_enableTRUE if the missed event feature must be enabled
ereportTRUE if the function must return an error on drive error
handlerthe handler function called when the trigger is enable
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function

a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured

◆ dsa_trigger_get_combi_dout_mask_a()

int dsa_trigger_get_combi_dout_mask_a ( DSA_DRIVE *  drv,
int  combi,
int  kind,
DSA_DWORD_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Get the trigger combi output mask (K320+(combi):0) - asynchronous.

Parameters
drvthe object pointer
combithe combi number (0 to 15)
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_0 Trigger Combination 0
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_1 Trigger Combination 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_2 Trigger Combination 2
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_3 Trigger Combination 3
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_4 Trigger Combination 4
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_5 Trigger Combination 5
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_6 Trigger Combination 6
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_7 Trigger Combination 7
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_8 Trigger Combination 8
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_9 Trigger Combination 9
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_10 Trigger Combination 10
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_11 Trigger Combination 11
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_12 Trigger Combination 12
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_13 Trigger Combination 13
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_14 Trigger Combination 14
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_15 Trigger Combination 15
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
handlerthe handler function called when the value is get
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error

DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error

◆ dsa_trigger_get_combi_dout_mask_s()

int dsa_trigger_get_combi_dout_mask_s ( DSA_DRIVE *  drv,
int  combi,
dword *  mask,
int  kind,
long  timeout 
)

Get the trigger combi output mask (K320+(combi):0) - synchronous.

Parameters
drvthe object pointer
combithe combi number (0 to 15)
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_0 Trigger Combination 0
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_1 Trigger Combination 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_2 Trigger Combination 2
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_3 Trigger Combination 3
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_4 Trigger Combination 4
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_5 Trigger Combination 5
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_6 Trigger Combination 6
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_7 Trigger Combination 7
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_8 Trigger Combination 8
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_9 Trigger Combination 9
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_10 Trigger Combination 10
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_11 Trigger Combination 11
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_12 Trigger Combination 12
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_13 Trigger Combination 13
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_14 Trigger Combination 14
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_15 Trigger Combination 15
maska pointer on the variable which will receive the output mask (bits 0..15: output reset, bit 16..31: output set)
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer

DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_trigger_get_combi_event_counter_group_a()

int dsa_trigger_get_combi_event_counter_group_a ( DSA_DRIVE *  drv,
int  combi,
int  kind,
DSA_INT_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Get the trigger combi of the event counter group, linked to M351 (K320+(combi):3) - asynchronous.

Parameters
drvthe object pointer
combithe combi number (0 to 15)
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_0 Trigger Combination 0
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_1 Trigger Combination 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_2 Trigger Combination 2
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_3 Trigger Combination 3
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_4 Trigger Combination 4
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_5 Trigger Combination 5
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_6 Trigger Combination 6
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_7 Trigger Combination 7
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_8 Trigger Combination 8
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_9 Trigger Combination 9
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_10 Trigger Combination 10
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_11 Trigger Combination 11
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_12 Trigger Combination 12
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_13 Trigger Combination 13
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_14 Trigger Combination 14
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_15 Trigger Combination 15
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
handlerthe handler function called when the value is get
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_trigger_get_combi_event_counter_group_s()

int dsa_trigger_get_combi_event_counter_group_s ( DSA_DRIVE *  drv,
int  combi,
int *  data,
int  kind,
long  timeout 
)

Get the trigger combi of the event counter group, linked to M351 (K320+(combi):3) - synchronous.

Parameters
drvthe object pointer
combithe combi number (0 to 15)
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_0 Trigger Combination 0
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_1 Trigger Combination 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_2 Trigger Combination 2
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_3 Trigger Combination 3
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_4 Trigger Combination 4
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_5 Trigger Combination 5
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_6 Trigger Combination 6
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_7 Trigger Combination 7
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_8 Trigger Combination 8
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_9 Trigger Combination 9
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_10 Trigger Combination 10
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_11 Trigger Combination 11
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_12 Trigger Combination 12
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_13 Trigger Combination 13
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_14 Trigger Combination 14
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_15 Trigger Combination 15
dataa pointer on the variable which will receive the value
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured

DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet

◆ dsa_trigger_get_combi_fdout_mask_s()

int dsa_trigger_get_combi_fdout_mask_s ( DSA_DRIVE *  drv,
int  combi,
dword *  mask,
int  kind,
long  timeout 
)

Get the trigger combi fast output mask (K320+(combi):1) - synchronous.

Parameters
drvthe object pointer
combithe combi number (0 to 15)
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_0 Trigger Combination 0
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_1 Trigger Combination 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_2 Trigger Combination 2
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_3 Trigger Combination 3
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_4 Trigger Combination 4
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_5 Trigger Combination 5
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_6 Trigger Combination 6
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_7 Trigger Combination 7
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_8 Trigger Combination 8
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_9 Trigger Combination 9
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_10 Trigger Combination 10
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_11 Trigger Combination 11
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_12 Trigger Combination 12
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_13 Trigger Combination 13
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_14 Trigger Combination 14
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_15 Trigger Combination 15
maska pointer on the variable which will receive the fast output (bits 0..15: fast output reset, bit 16..31: fast output set)
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered

DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed

DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed

DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version

DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool

◆ dsa_trigger_get_combi_user_status_mask_s()

int dsa_trigger_get_combi_user_status_mask_s ( DSA_DRIVE *  drv,
int  combi,
dword *  mask,
int  kind,
long  timeout 
)

Get the trigger combi user status (K320+(combi):7) - synchronous.

Parameters
drvthe object pointer
combithe combi number (0 to 15)
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_0 Trigger Combination 0
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_1 Trigger Combination 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_2 Trigger Combination 2
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_3 Trigger Combination 3
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_4 Trigger Combination 4
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_5 Trigger Combination 5
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_6 Trigger Combination 6
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_7 Trigger Combination 7
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_8 Trigger Combination 8
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_9 Trigger Combination 9
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_10 Trigger Combination 10
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_11 Trigger Combination 11
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_12 Trigger Combination 12
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_13 Trigger Combination 13
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_14 Trigger Combination 14
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_15 Trigger Combination 15
maskthe mask of the user status bit (bits 0..15: bits to set, bit 16..31: bits to reset)
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered

DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed

DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed

DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool

long  timeout 
)

  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value

  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured

DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_trigger_get_continuous_user_status_bit_a()

int dsa_trigger_get_continuous_user_status_bit_a ( DSA_DRIVE *  drv,
int  kind,
DSA_INT_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Get bit of the user status to activate when number of free event is reached (K337:1) - asynchronous.

Parameters
drvthe object pointer
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
handlerthe handler function called when the value is get
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration

DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed

DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error

DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available

int dsa_trigger_get_continuous_user_status_bit_s ( DSA_DRIVE *  drv,
int *  user_status_bit,
int  kind,
long  timeout 
)

Get bit of the user status to activate when number of free event is reached (K337:1) - synchronous.

Parameters
drvthe object pointer
user_status_bita pointer on a variable which will receive the bit of the user status
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet

int dsa_trigger_get_dout_mask_s ( DSA_DRIVE *  drv,
dword *  mask,
int  kind,
long  timeout 
)

Get the trigger output mask (K359) - synchronous.

Parameters
drvthe object pointer
maska pointer on variable which will contain the output mask (bits 0..15: output non-inverted, bit 16..31: output inverted)
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered

◆ dsa_trigger_get_missed_event_detection_action_s()

int dsa_trigger_get_missed_event_detection_action_s ( DSA_DRIVE *  drv,
int *  action,
int  kind,
long  timeout 
)

Get the trigger missed event detection action (K349) - synchronous.

Parameters
drvthe object pointer
actiona pointer on variable which will receive the trigger missed event detection action
  • DSA_TRIGGER_GENERATE_ERROR_ON_MISSED_EVENT Generate an event if missed event have been detected
  • DSA_TRIGGER_GENERATE_WARNING_ON_MISSED_EVENTGenerate a warning if missed event have been detected
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_trigger_get_missed_event_detection_timeout_a()

void *  param 
)

Get the trigger missed event detection timeout (K347) - asynchronous.

Parameters
drvthe object pointer
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value

double *  missed_event_timeout,
int  kind,
long  timeout 
)

Get the trigger missed event detection timeout (K347) - synchronous.

Parameters
drvthe object pointer
missed_event_timeouta pointer on variable which will receive the trigger missed event detection timeout in MLTI
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured

◆ dsa_trigger_get_missed_event_detection_tolerance_a()

int dsa_trigger_get_missed_event_detection_tolerance_a ( DSA_DRIVE *  drv,
int  kind,
DSA_DOUBLE_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Get the trigger missed event detection tolerance in ISO units (K348) - asynchronous.

Warning: The tolerance is returned in ISO units (m or t). EDI will use the destination axis to convert this position in increments. If the position is a position referrencing another axis than the destination one, you must convert the ISO position in increments and use dsa_trigger_get_missed_event_detection_tolerance_increment_a instead

Parameters
drvthe object pointer
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
handlerthe handler function called when the value is get
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error

◆ dsa_trigger_get_missed_event_detection_tolerance_increment_a()

int dsa_trigger_get_missed_event_detection_tolerance_increment_a ( DSA_DRIVE *  drv,
int  kind,
DSA_INT_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Get the trigger missed event detection tolerance in INCREMENT (K348) - asynchronous.

Warning: The tolerance is returned in INCREMENTS. This function must be used if the position is a position referrencing another axis than the destination one. Otherwise, you can use use dsa_trigger_get_missed_event_detection_tolerance_increment_a an give the position in ISO units (m or t)

Parameters
drvthe object pointer
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
handlerthe handler function called when the value is get
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error

  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value

DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_trigger_get_position_compensation_s()

int dsa_trigger_get_position_compensation_s ( DSA_DRIVE *  drv,
int *  position_compensation,
int  kind,
long  timeout 
)

Get the trigger position compensation (K360:1) - synchronous.

Parameters
drvthe object pointer
position_compensationa pointer on variable which will receive the trigger position compensation
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error

DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error

◆ dsa_trigger_get_position_type_s()

int dsa_trigger_get_position_type_s ( DSA_DRIVE *  drv,
int *  type,
int  kind,
long  timeout 
)

Get the trigger position type (K336) - synchronous.

Parameters
drvthe object pointer
typea pointer on variable which will receive the trigger position type
  • DSA_TRIGGER_TYPE_REAL_POSITION the trigger uses real position
  • DSA_TRIGGER_TYPE_THEORETICAL_POSITION the trigger uses theoretical position
  • DSA_TRIGGER_TYPE_REGISTER_POSITION the trigger Position is defined by a register
  • DSA_TRIGGER_TYPE_PUBLISH_REAL_POSITION the trigger Real Position is published in ML340
  • DSA_TRIGGER_TYPE_PUBLISH_THEORETICAL_POSITION the trigger Theoretical Position published in ML340
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found

DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool

DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete

int  pulse_generator,
double *  delay,
int  kind,
long  timeout 
)

Get a trigger pulse generator delay (K342:(pulse_generator)) - synchronous.

Parameters
drvthe object pointer
pulse_generatorthe pulse generator
  • DSA_TRIGGER_PG_1 the pulse generator 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_PG_2 the pulse generator 2
delaya pointer to the variable which will receive the the delay in seconds
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout

a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured

DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error

DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_trigger_get_pulse_generator_dout_mask_a()

int dsa_trigger_get_pulse_generator_dout_mask_a ( DSA_DRIVE *  drv,
int  pulse_generator,
int  kind,
DSA_DWORD_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Get a trigger pulse generator output mask (K340+(pulse_generator):0) - asynchronous.

Parameters
drvthe object pointer
pulse_generatorthe pulse generator
  • DSA_TRIGGER_PG_1 the pulse generator 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_PG_2 the pulse generator 2
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
handlerthe handler function called when the value is get
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error

int  pulse_generator,
dword *  mask,
int  kind,
long  timeout 
)

Get a trigger pulse generator output mask (K340+(pulse_generator):0) - synchronous.

Parameters
drvthe object pointer
pulse_generatorthe pulse generator
  • DSA_TRIGGER_PG_1 the pulse generator 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_PG_2 the pulse generator 2
maska pointer on a variable which will receive the output mask
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition

int  pulse_generator,
int  kind,
DSA_FLOAT_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Get a trigger pulse generator period modulation coefficient between 2 rising edges of pulse (KF339:(pulse_generator)) - asynchronous.

Parameters
drvthe object pointer
pulse_generatorthe pulse generator
  • DSA_TRIGGER_PG_1 the pulse generator 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_PG_2 the pulse generator 2
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
handlerthe handler function called when the value is get
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

int dsa_trigger_get_pulse_generator_period_coeff_s ( DSA_DRIVE *  drv,
int  pulse_generator,
float *  coeff,
int  kind,
long  timeout 
)

Get a trigger pulse generator period modulation coefficient between 2 rising edges of pulse (KF339:(pulse_generator)) - synchronous.

Parameters
drvthe object pointer
pulse_generatorthe pulse generator
  • DSA_TRIGGER_PG_1 the pulse generator 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_PG_2 the pulse generator 2
coeffa pointer to the variable which will receive the the period modulation coefficient
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
