int  pulse_generator,
double *  period,
int  kind,
long  timeout 
)

Get a trigger pulse generator period (K339:(pulse_generator)) - synchronous.

Parameters
drvthe object pointer
pulse_generatorthe pulse generator
  • DSA_TRIGGER_PG_1 the pulse generator 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_PG_2 the pulse generator 2
perioda pointer to the variable which will receive the the period in seconds
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout

◆ dsa_trigger_get_source_register_axis_a()

int dsa_trigger_get_source_register_axis_a ( DSA_DRIVE *  drv,
int  trigger_feature,
int  kind,
DSA_INT_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Get the axis whose register is used as source for trigger functions (K356:(trigger_feature)) - asynchronous.

Parameters
drvthe object pointer
trigger_featurethe trigger feature
  • DSA_TRIGGER_PG_1 the pulse generator 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_PG_2 the pulse generator 2
  • DSA_TRIGGER_REGISTER_POSITION Trigger Position given by register
  • DSA_TRIGGER_MISSED_EVENT_POSITION the Trigger Position of missed event
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
handlerthe handler function called when the value is get
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_trigger_get_source_register_axis_s()

int dsa_trigger_get_source_register_axis_s ( DSA_DRIVE *  drv,
int  trigger_feature,
int *  axis,
int  kind,
long  timeout 
)

Get the axis whose register is used as source for trigger functions (K356:(trigger_feature)) - synchronous.

Parameters
drvthe object pointer
trigger_featurethe trigger feature
  • DSA_TRIGGER_PG_1 the pulse generator 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_PG_2 the pulse generator 2
  • DSA_TRIGGER_REGISTER_POSITION Trigger Position given by register
  • DSA_TRIGGER_MISSED_EVENT_POSITION the Trigger Position of missed event
axisthe axis whose register is used as source of the trigger (For version < 3.10A)
  • 0 the source register must be taken from current axis (For version >= 3.10A)
  • 1 the source register must be taken from other axis axis (For version >= 3.10A)
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

  • DSA_TRIGGER_MISSED_EVENT_POSITION the Trigger Position of missed event
idxa pointer to the variable which will receive the source register index
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value

  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)

)

drvthe object pointer
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value

DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_trigger_get_time_compensation_s()

int dsa_trigger_get_time_compensation_s ( DSA_DRIVE *  drv,
double *  delay,
int  kind,
long  timeout 
)

Get the trigger time compensation (KF360) - synchronous.

Parameters
drvthe object pointer
delaya pointer on variable which will receive the trigger time compensation
kindthe kind of value to read
  • DSA_GET_CURRENT get current value, bypass pending commands
  • DSA_GET_MIN_VALUE get the minimum value
  • DSA_GET_MAX_VALUE get the maximum value
  • DSA_GET_DEF_VALUE get the default value
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_trigger_init_a()

int dsa_trigger_init_a ( DSA_DRIVE_BASE *  grp,
dword  dout,
dword  fdout,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Initialize trigger outputs (Command:TRR) - asynchronous.

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
doutthe output mask (bits 0..15: output to reset, bit 16..31: output to set)
fdoutthe fast output mask (bits 0..15: output to reset, bit 16..31: output to set)
handlerthe handler function called when the trigger is initialized
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered

DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed

DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error

dword  dout,
dword  fdout,
long  timeout 
)

Initialize trigger outputs (Command:TRR) - synchronous.

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
doutthe output mask (bits 0..15: output to reset, bit 16..31: output to set)
fdoutthe fast output mask (bits 0..15: output to reset, bit 16..31: output to set)
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured

int  combi,

DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
combithe combi number (0 to 15)
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_0 Trigger Combination 0
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_1 Trigger Combination 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_2 Trigger Combination 2
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_3 Trigger Combination 3

  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_9 Trigger Combination 9
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_10 Trigger Combination 10
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_11 Trigger Combination 11
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_12 Trigger Combination 12
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_13 Trigger Combination 13
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_14 Trigger Combination 14
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_15 Trigger Combination 15
maskthe mask of the output (bits 0..15: output to reset, bit 16..31: output to set)
handlerthe handler function called when the value is set
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured

DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_trigger_set_combi_event_counter_group_a()

int dsa_trigger_set_combi_event_counter_group_a ( DSA_DRIVE_BASE *  grp,
int  combi,
int  data,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Set the trigger combi of the event counter group, linked to M351 (K320+(combi):3) - asynchronous.

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
combithe combi number (0 to 15)
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_0 Trigger Combination 0
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_1 Trigger Combination 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_2 Trigger Combination 2
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_3 Trigger Combination 3
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_4 Trigger Combination 4
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_5 Trigger Combination 5
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_6 Trigger Combination 6
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_7 Trigger Combination 7
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_8 Trigger Combination 8
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_9 Trigger Combination 9
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_10 Trigger Combination 10
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_11 Trigger Combination 11
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_12 Trigger Combination 12
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_13 Trigger Combination 13
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_14 Trigger Combination 14
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_15 Trigger Combination 15
dataa value of 1 for resetting the event counter group
handlerthe handler function called when the value is set
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_trigger_set_combi_event_counter_group_s()

int dsa_trigger_set_combi_event_counter_group_s ( DSA_DRIVE_BASE *  grp,
int  combi,
int  data,
long  timeout 
)

Set the trigger combi of the event counter group, linked to M351 (K320+(combi):3) - synchronous.

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
combithe combi number (0 to 15)
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_0 Trigger Combination 0
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_1 Trigger Combination 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_2 Trigger Combination 2
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_3 Trigger Combination 3
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_4 Trigger Combination 4
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_5 Trigger Combination 5
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_6 Trigger Combination 6
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_7 Trigger Combination 7
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_8 Trigger Combination 8
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_9 Trigger Combination 9
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_10 Trigger Combination 10
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_11 Trigger Combination 11
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_12 Trigger Combination 12
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_13 Trigger Combination 13
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_14 Trigger Combination 14
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_15 Trigger Combination 15
dataa value of 1 for resetting the event counter group
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered

DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state

DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed

DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error

DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete

◆ dsa_trigger_set_combi_fdout_mask_a()

int dsa_trigger_set_combi_fdout_mask_a ( DSA_DRIVE_BASE *  grp,
int  combi,
dword  mask,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Set the trigger combi fast output mask (K320+(combi):1) - asynchronous.

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
combithe combi number (0 to 15)
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_0 Trigger Combination 0
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_1 Trigger Combination 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_2 Trigger Combination 2
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_3 Trigger Combination 3
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_4 Trigger Combination 4
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_5 Trigger Combination 5
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_6 Trigger Combination 6
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_7 Trigger Combination 7
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_8 Trigger Combination 8
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_9 Trigger Combination 9
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_10 Trigger Combination 10
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_11 Trigger Combination 11
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_12 Trigger Combination 12
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_13 Trigger Combination 13
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_14 Trigger Combination 14
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_15 Trigger Combination 15
maskthe mask of the fast output (bits 0..15: fast output to reset, bit 16..31: fast output to set)
handlerthe handler function called when the value is set
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered

DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group

DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration

DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed

DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found

int dsa_trigger_set_combi_fdout_mask_s ( DSA_DRIVE_BASE *  grp,
int  combi,
dword  mask,
long  timeout 
)

Set the trigger combi fast output mask (K320+(combi):1) - synchronous.

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
combithe combi number (0 to 15)
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_0 Trigger Combination 0
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_1 Trigger Combination 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_2 Trigger Combination 2
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_3 Trigger Combination 3
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_4 Trigger Combination 4
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_5 Trigger Combination 5
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_6 Trigger Combination 6
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_7 Trigger Combination 7
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_8 Trigger Combination 8
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_9 Trigger Combination 9
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_10 Trigger Combination 10
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_11 Trigger Combination 11
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_12 Trigger Combination 12
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_13 Trigger Combination 13
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_14 Trigger Combination 14
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_15 Trigger Combination 15
maskthe mask of the fast output (bits 0..15: fast output to reset, bit 16..31: fast output to set)
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered

  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_14 Trigger Combination 14
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_15 Trigger Combination 15

DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_trigger_set_continuous_user_status_bit_a()

int dsa_trigger_set_continuous_user_status_bit_a ( DSA_DRIVE_BASE *  grp,
int  user_status_bit,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Set bit of the user status to activate when number of free event is reached (K337:1) - asynchronous.

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
user_status_bituser status bit to activate
handlerthe handler function called when the value is set
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

int  user_status_bit,
long  timeout 
)

Set bit of the user status to activate when number of free event is reached (K337:1) - synchronous.

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
user_status_bituser status bit to activate
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured

◆ dsa_trigger_set_incremental_mode_event_a()

int dsa_trigger_set_incremental_mode_event_a ( DSA_DRIVE_BASE *  grp,
int  event_nb,
double  position,
int  type,
int  action,
double  delta_pos,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Set an incremental mode event (EL<event_nb>) - asynchronous.

Warning: The position and delta_pos are given in ISO units (m or t). EDI will use the destination axis to convert this position in increments. If the position is a position referrencing another axis than the destination one, you must convert the ISO position in increments and use dsa_trigger_set_incremental_mode_event_increment_a instead

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
event_nbthe event number 0..255 (0..511 from FW version 3.10A)
positionthe position (real or theoritical) in m or t
typethe type of the trigger
  • DSA_TRIGGER_POSITIVE trigger is reached when the position increases
  • DSA_TRIGGER_NEGATIVE trigger is reached when the position decreases
  • Other values can be set (see AccurET Operation manual)
actionthe action of the pulse generator
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_NO_PULSE no pulse generator is selected
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_START_PG1 start pulse generator 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_STOP_PG1 stop pulse generator 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_START_PG2 start pulse generator 2
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_STOP_PG2 stop pulse generator 2
delta_posthe delta position in m or t
handlerthe handler function called when the value is set
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_trigger_set_incremental_mode_event_increment_a()

int dsa_trigger_set_incremental_mode_event_increment_a ( DSA_DRIVE_BASE *  grp,
int  event_nb,
eint64  position,
int  type,
int  action,
eint64  delta_pos,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Set an incremental mode event in INCREMENT (EL<event_nb>) - asynchronous.

Warning: The position and delta_pos are given in INCREMENTS. This function must be used if the position is a position referrencing another axis than the destination one. Otherwise, you can use use dsa_trigger_set_incremental_mode_event_a an give the position in ISO units (m or t)

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
event_nbthe event number 0..255 (0..511 from FW version 3.10A)
positionthe position (real or theoritical) in INCREMENT
typethe type of the trigger
  • DSA_TRIGGER_POSITIVE trigger is reached when the position increases
  • DSA_TRIGGER_NEGATIVE trigger is reached when the position decreases
  • Other values can be set (see AccurET Operation manual)
actionthe action of the pulse generator
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_NO_PULSE no pulse generator is selected
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_START_PG1 start pulse generator 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_STOP_PG1 stop pulse generator 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_START_PG2 start pulse generator 2
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_STOP_PG2 stop pulse generator 2
delta_posthe delta position in INCREMENT
handlerthe handler function called when the value is set
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_trigger_set_incremental_mode_event_increment_s()

int dsa_trigger_set_incremental_mode_event_increment_s ( DSA_DRIVE_BASE *  grp,
int  event_nb,
eint64  position,
int  type,
int  action,
eint64  delta_pos,
long  timeout 
)

Set an incremental mode event in INCREMENT(EL<event_nb>) - synchronous.

Warning: The position and delta_pos are given in INCREMENTS. This function must be used if the position is a position referrencing another axis than the destination one. Otherwise, you can use use dsa_trigger_set_incremental_mode_event_s an give the position in ISO units (m or t)

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
event_nbthe event number 0..255 (0..511 from FW version 3.10A)
positionthe position (real or theoritical) in INCREMENT
typethe type of the trigger
  • DSA_TRIGGER_POSITIVE trigger is reached when the position increases
  • DSA_TRIGGER_NEGATIVE trigger is reached when the position decreases
  • Other values can be set (see AccurET Operation manual)
actionthe action of the pulse generator
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_NO_PULSE no pulse generator is selected
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_START_PG1 start pulse generator 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_STOP_PG1 stop pulse generator 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_START_PG2 start pulse generator 2
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_STOP_PG2 stop pulse generator 2
delta_posthe delta position in INCREMENT
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool

DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed

◆ dsa_trigger_set_incremental_mode_event_s()

int dsa_trigger_set_incremental_mode_event_s ( DSA_DRIVE_BASE *  grp,
int  event_nb,
double  position,
int  type,
int  action,
double  delta_pos,
long  timeout 
)

Set an incremental mode event (EL<event_nb>) - synchronous.

Warning: The position and delta_pos are given in ISO units (m or t). EDI will use the destination axis to convert this position in increments. If the position is a position referrencing another axis than the destination one, you must convert the ISO position in increments and use dsa_trigger_set_incremental_mode_event_increment_s instead

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
event_nbthe event number 0..255 (0..511 from FW version 3.10A)
positionthe position (real or theoritical) in m or t
typethe type of the trigger
  • DSA_TRIGGER_POSITIVE trigger is reached when the position increases
  • DSA_TRIGGER_NEGATIVE trigger is reached when the position decreases
  • Other values can be set (see AccurET Operation manual)
actionthe action of the pulse generator
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_NO_PULSE no pulse generator is selected
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_START_PG1 start pulse generator 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_STOP_PG1 stop pulse generator 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_START_PG2 start pulse generator 2
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_STOP_PG2 stop pulse generator 2
delta_posthe delta position in m or t
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_trigger_set_missed_event_detection_action_a()

int dsa_trigger_set_missed_event_detection_action_a ( DSA_DRIVE_BASE *  grp,
int  action,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Set the trigger missed event detection action (K349) - asynchronous.

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
actionthe trigger missed event detection action
  • DSA_TRIGGER_GENERATE_ERROR_ON_MISSED_EVENT Generate an event if missed event have been detected
  • DSA_TRIGGER_GENERATE_WARNING_ON_MISSED_EVENTGenerate a warning if missed event have been detected
handlerthe handler function called when the value is set
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered

◆ dsa_trigger_set_missed_event_detection_tolerance_a()

int dsa_trigger_set_missed_event_detection_tolerance_a ( DSA_DRIVE_BASE *  grp,
double  tolerance,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Set the trigger missed event detection tolerance in ISO units (K348) - asynchronous.

Warning: The tolerance is given in ISO units (m or t). EDI will use the destination axis to convert this position in increments. If the position is a position referrencing another axis than the destination one, you must convert the ISO position in increments and use dsa_trigger_set_missed_event_detection_tolerance_increment_a instead

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
tolerancethe trigger missed event detection tolerance in ISO units (m, t)
handlerthe handler function called when the value is set
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state

DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error

◆ dsa_trigger_set_missed_event_detection_tolerance_increment_a()

int dsa_trigger_set_missed_event_detection_tolerance_increment_a ( DSA_DRIVE_BASE *  grp,
int  tolerance,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Set the trigger missed event detection tolerance in INCREMENT (K348) - asynchronous.

Warning: The tolerance is given in INCREMENTS. This function must be used if the position is a position referrencing another axis than the destination one. Otherwise, you can use use dsa_trigger_set_missed_event_detection_tolerance_increment_a an give the position in ISO units (m or t)

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
tolerancethe trigger missed event detection tolerance in INCREMENT
handlerthe handler function called when the value is set
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original

◆ dsa_trigger_set_position_compensation_a()

int  position_compensation,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Set the trigger position compensation (K360:1) - aynchronous.

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
position_compensationthe trigger position compensation [2..3]
handlerthe handler function called when the value is set
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured

DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_trigger_set_position_compensation_s()

int dsa_trigger_set_position_compensation_s ( DSA_DRIVE_BASE *  grp,
int  position_compensation,
long  timeout 
)

Set the trigger position compensation (K360:1) - synchronous.

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
position_compensationthe trigger position compensation [2..3]
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete

DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error

◆ dsa_trigger_set_position_type_a()

int dsa_trigger_set_position_type_a ( DSA_DRIVE_BASE *  grp,
int  type,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Set the trigger position type (K336) - asynchronous.

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
typethe trigger position type
  • DSA_TRIGGER_TYPE_REAL_POSITION the trigger uses real position
  • DSA_TRIGGER_TYPE_THEORETICAL_POSITION the trigger uses theoretical position
  • DSA_TRIGGER_TYPE_REGISTER_POSITION the trigger Position is defined by a register
  • DSA_TRIGGER_TYPE_PUBLISH_REAL_POSITION the trigger Real Position is published in ML340
  • DSA_TRIGGER_TYPE_PUBLISH_THEORETICAL_POSITION the trigger Theoretical Position published in ML340
handlerthe handler function called when the value is set
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error

DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error

DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_trigger_set_pulse_generator_dout_mask_s()

int dsa_trigger_set_pulse_generator_dout_mask_s ( DSA_DRIVE_BASE *  grp,
int  pulse_generator,
dword  mask,
long  timeout 
)

Set a trigger pulse generator output mask (K340+(pulse_generator):0) - synchronous.

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
pulse_generatorthe pulse generator
  • DSA_TRIGGER_PG_1 the pulse generator 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_PG_2 the pulse generator 2
maskthe output mask
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error

DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

int dsa_trigger_set_pulse_generator_interval_a ( DSA_DRIVE_BASE *  grp,
int  pulse_generator,
double  interval,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Set a trigger pulse generator pulse interval (K344:(pulse_generator)) - asynchronous.

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
pulse_generatorthe pulse generator
  • DSA_TRIGGER_PG_1 the pulse generator 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_PG_2 the pulse generator 2
intervalthe interval between 2 pulse in seconds
handlerthe handler function called when the value is set
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group

DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state

DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error

DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available

int  pulse_generator,
double  period,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Set a trigger pulse generator period between 2 rising edges of pulse (K339:(pulse_generator)) - asynchronous.

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
pulse_generatorthe pulse generator
  • DSA_TRIGGER_PG_1 the pulse generator 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_PG_2 the pulse generator 2
periodthe period in seconds
handlerthe handler function called when the value is set
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered

  • DSA_TRIGGER_PG_2 the pulse generator 2

DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_trigger_set_pulse_generator_period_s()

int dsa_trigger_set_pulse_generator_period_s ( DSA_DRIVE_BASE *  grp,
int  pulse_generator,
double  period,
long  timeout 
)

Set a trigger pulse generator period between 2 rising edges of pulse (K339:(pulse_generator)) - synchronous.

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
pulse_generatorthe pulse generator
  • DSA_TRIGGER_PG_1 the pulse generator 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_PG_2 the pulse generator 2
periodthe period in seconds
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

  • DSA_TRIGGER_PG_2 the pulse generator 2

handlerthe handler function called when the value is set

◆ dsa_trigger_set_source_register_axis_a()

int dsa_trigger_set_source_register_axis_a ( DSA_DRIVE_BASE *  grp,
int  trigger_feature,
int  axis,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Set the axis whose register is used as source for trigger functions (K356:(trigger_feature)) - asynchronous.

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
trigger_featurethe trigger feature
  • DSA_TRIGGER_PG_1 the pulse generator 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_PG_2 the pulse generator 2
  • DSA_TRIGGER_REGISTER_POSITION Trigger Position given by register
  • DSA_TRIGGER_MISSED_EVENT_POSITION the Trigger Position of missed event
axisthe axis whose register is used as source of the trigger (For version < 3.10A)
  • 0 the source register must be taken from current axis (For version >= 3.10A)
  • 1 the source register must be taken from other axis axis (For version >= 3.10A)
handlerthe handler function called when the value is set
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

  • DSA_TRIGGER_PG_1 the pulse generator 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_PG_2 the pulse generator 2
  • DSA_TRIGGER_REGISTER_POSITION Trigger Position given by register
  • DSA_TRIGGER_MISSED_EVENT_POSITION the Trigger Position of missed event
sidxthe register sub-index used as source
handlerthe handler function called when the value is set
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_trigger_set_source_register_sidx_s()

int dsa_trigger_set_source_register_sidx_s ( DSA_DRIVE_BASE *  grp,
int  trigger_feature,
int  sidx,
long  timeout 
)

Set the register sub-index used as source for trigger functions (K355:(trigger_feature)) - synchronous.

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
trigger_featurethe trigger feature
  • DSA_TRIGGER_PG_1 the pulse generator 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_PG_2 the pulse generator 2
  • DSA_TRIGGER_REGISTER_POSITION Trigger Position given by register
  • DSA_TRIGGER_MISSED_EVENT_POSITION the Trigger Position of missed event
sidxthe register sub-index used as source
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered

DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error

◆ dsa_trigger_set_source_register_type_a()

int dsa_trigger_set_source_register_type_a ( DSA_DRIVE_BASE *  grp,
int  trigger_feature,
int  typ,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Set the register type used as source for trigger functions (K353:(trigger_feature)) - asynchronous.

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
trigger_featurethe trigger feature
  • DSA_TRIGGER_PG_1 the pulse generator 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_PG_2 the pulse generator 2
  • DSA_TRIGGER_REGISTER_POSITION Trigger Position given by register
  • DSA_TRIGGER_MISSED_EVENT_POSITION the Trigger Position of missed event
typthe register type used as source
  • DMD_TYP_USER_INT32 32 bits integer user registers (X)
  • DMD_TYP_USER_FLOAT32 32 bits float user registers (XF)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_INT32 32 bits integer monitoring registers (M)
  • DMD_TYP_MONITOR_FLOAT32 32 bits float monitoring registers (MF)
handlerthe handler function called when the value is set
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled

DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool

DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete

◆ dsa_trigger_set_standard_mode_event_a()

int dsa_trigger_set_standard_mode_event_a ( DSA_DRIVE_BASE *  grp,
int  event_nb,
double  position,
int  type,
int  combi,
int  action,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Set a standard mode event (EL<event_nb>) - asynchronous.

Warning: The position is given in ISO units (m or t). EDI will use the destination axis to convert this position in increments. If the position is a position referrencing another axis than the destination one, you must convert the ISO position in increments and use dsa_trigger_set_standard_mode_event_increment_a instead

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
event_nbthe event number 0..255 (0..511 from FW version 3.10A)
positionthe position (real or theoritical) in m or t
typethe type of the trigger
  • DSA_TRIGGER_POSITIVE trigger is reached when the position increases
  • DSA_TRIGGER_NEGATIVE trigger is reached when the position decreases
  • Other values can be set (see AccurET Operation manual)
combithe combi number (0 to 15)
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_0 Trigger Combination 0
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_1 Trigger Combination 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_2 Trigger Combination 2
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_3 Trigger Combination 3
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_4 Trigger Combination 4
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_5 Trigger Combination 5
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_6 Trigger Combination 6
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_7 Trigger Combination 7
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_8 Trigger Combination 8
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_9 Trigger Combination 9
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_10 Trigger Combination 10
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_11 Trigger Combination 11
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_12 Trigger Combination 12
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_13 Trigger Combination 13
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_14 Trigger Combination 14
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_15 Trigger Combination 15
actionthe action of the pulse generator
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_NO_PULSE no pulse generator is selected
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_START_PG1 start pulse generator 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_STOP_PG1 stop pulse generator 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_START_PG2 start pulse generator 2
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_STOP_PG2 stop pulse generator 2
handlerthe handler function called when the value is set
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

◆ dsa_trigger_set_standard_mode_event_increment_a()

int dsa_trigger_set_standard_mode_event_increment_a ( DSA_DRIVE_BASE *  grp,
int  event_nb,
eint64  position,
int  type,
int  combi,
int  action,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Set a standard mode event in INCREMENT (EL<event_nb>) - asynchronous.

Warning: The position is given in INCREMENTS. This function must be used if the position is a position referrencing another axis than the destination one. Otherwise, you can use use dsa_trigger_set_standard_mode_event_a an give the position in ISO units (m or t)

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
event_nbthe event number 0..255 (0..511 from FW version 3.10A)
positionthe position (real or theoritical) in INCREMENT
typethe type of the trigger
  • DSA_TRIGGER_POSITIVE trigger is reached when the position increases
  • DSA_TRIGGER_NEGATIVE trigger is reached when the position decreases
  • Other values can be set (see AccurET Operation manual)
combithe combi number (0 to 15)
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_0 Trigger Combination 0
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_1 Trigger Combination 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_2 Trigger Combination 2
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_3 Trigger Combination 3
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_4 Trigger Combination 4
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_5 Trigger Combination 5
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_6 Trigger Combination 6
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_7 Trigger Combination 7
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_8 Trigger Combination 8
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_9 Trigger Combination 9
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_10 Trigger Combination 10
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_11 Trigger Combination 11
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_12 Trigger Combination 12
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_13 Trigger Combination 13
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_14 Trigger Combination 14
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_15 Trigger Combination 15
actionthe action of the pulse generator
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_NO_PULSE no pulse generator is selected
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_START_PG1 start pulse generator 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_STOP_PG1 stop pulse generator 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_START_PG2 start pulse generator 2
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_STOP_PG2 stop pulse generator 2
handlerthe handler function called when the value is set
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error

DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error

int dsa_trigger_set_standard_mode_event_increment_s ( DSA_DRIVE_BASE *  grp,
int  event_nb,
eint64  position,
int  type,
int  combi,
int  action,
long  timeout 
)

Set a standard mode event in increment (EL<event_nb>) - synchronous.

Warning: The position is given in INCREMENTS. This function must be used if the position is a position referrencing another axis than the destination one. Otherwise, you can use use dsa_trigger_set_standard_mode_event_s an give the position in ISO units (m or t)

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
event_nbthe event number 0..255 (0..511 from FW version 3.10A)
positionthe position (real or theoretical) in increment
typethe type of the trigger
  • DSA_TRIGGER_POSITIVE trigger is reached when the position increases
  • DSA_TRIGGER_NEGATIVE trigger is reached when the position decreases
  • Other values can be set (see AccurET Operation manual)
combithe combi number (0 to 15)
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_0 Trigger Combination 0
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_1 Trigger Combination 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_2 Trigger Combination 2
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_3 Trigger Combination 3
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_4 Trigger Combination 4
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_5 Trigger Combination 5
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_6 Trigger Combination 6
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_7 Trigger Combination 7
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_8 Trigger Combination 8
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_9 Trigger Combination 9
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_10 Trigger Combination 10
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_11 Trigger Combination 11
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_12 Trigger Combination 12
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_13 Trigger Combination 13
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_14 Trigger Combination 14
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_15 Trigger Combination 15
actionthe action of the pulse generator

  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_STOP_PG1 stop pulse generator 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_START_PG2 start pulse generator 2
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_STOP_PG2 stop pulse generator 2
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered

int dsa_trigger_set_standard_mode_event_s ( DSA_DRIVE_BASE *  grp,
int  event_nb,
double  position,
int  type,
int  combi,
int  action,
long  timeout 
)

Set a standard mode event (EL<event_nb>) - synchronous.

Warning: The position is given in ISO units (m or t). EDI will use the destination axis to convert this position in increments. If the position is a position referrencing another axis than the destination one, you must convert the ISO position in increments and use dsa_trigger_set_standard_mode_event_increment_s instead

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
event_nbthe event number 0..255 (0..511 from FW version 3.10A)
positionthe position (real or theoretical) in m or t
typethe type of the trigger
  • DSA_TRIGGER_POSITIVE trigger is reached when the position increases
  • DSA_TRIGGER_NEGATIVE trigger is reached when the position decreases
  • Other values can be set (see AccurET Operation manual)
combithe combi number (0 to 15)
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_0 Trigger Combination 0
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_1 Trigger Combination 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_2 Trigger Combination 2
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_3 Trigger Combination 3
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_4 Trigger Combination 4
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_5 Trigger Combination 5
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_6 Trigger Combination 6
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_7 Trigger Combination 7
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_8 Trigger Combination 8
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_9 Trigger Combination 9
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_10 Trigger Combination 10
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_11 Trigger Combination 11
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_12 Trigger Combination 12
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_13 Trigger Combination 13
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_14 Trigger Combination 14
  • DSA_TRIGGER_COMBI_15 Trigger Combination 15
actionthe action of the pulse generator
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_NO_PULSE no pulse generator is selected
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_START_PG1 start pulse generator 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_STOP_PG1 stop pulse generator 1
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_START_PG2 start pulse generator 2
  • DSA_TRIGGER_ACTION_STOP_PG2 stop pulse generator 2
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
DSA_EBADCOMPRESSTOOL Unhandled compress tool
DSA_EBADDRIVER bad device driver installed
DSA_EBADDRVVER bad drive version
DSA_EBADIPOLGRP bad ipol group
DSA_EBADLIBRARY function of external library not found
DSA_EBADPARAM bad parameter
DSA_EBADSEQVERSION Version syntax error (Syntax: [n]n.nnc)
DSA_EBADSTATE bad state
DSA_EBUSERROR bus in error state
DSA_EBUSRESET bus in reset state
DSA_ECANCEL transaction canceled
DSA_ECFGCOMPFILE File compiled for different axes configuration
DSA_ECONVERT conversion error
DSA_EDRVERROR drive in error
DSA_EDRVFAILED drive failed
DSA_EEQUATION Equation cannot be resolved
DSA_EFLUSH Flush communication timeout
DSA_EINTERNAL internal error
DSA_EMAPNOTACTIVATED Mapping cannot be activated by the device
DSA_EMETAHEADER bad metadata header
DSA_EMETAHEADERVER bad metadata header version
DSA_EMETAPARSER Metadata parsing error
DSA_ENOACK no acknowledge
DSA_ENODRIVE no drive response
DSA_ENOFREESLOT no free slot available
DSA_ENOFWINPOOL Firmware not found in FW pool
DSA_ENOLIBRARY external library not found
DSA_ENOTIMPLEMENTED not implemented
DSA_EOBSOLETE function is obsolete
DSA_EOPENPORT open com error
DSA_ERTVREADSYNCRO RTV read synchronization error
DSA_ERTVWRITESYNCRO RTV write syncronisation error
DSA_ESYNTAX Mapping file syntax error
DSA_ESYSTEM system error
DSA_ETIMEOUT timeout error
DSA_ETRANS transaction error
DSA_ETRANSNET Transnet is not established in imparted time
DSA_EUNZIP Unable to unzip metadata buffer
DSA_EUPLOADFILE MD5 of uploaded file does not fit MD5 of original
DSA_EWFP Communication not opened(device in WaitForProgram)

void *  param 
)

delaythe trigger time compensation in seconds
handlerthe handler function called when the value is set

Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
delaythe trigger time compensation in seconds
timeoutthe timeout value in ms or
  • DSA_DEF_TIMEOUT a value depending of the used communication bus (generally 1 or 2 seconds)
  • INFINITE infinite timeout
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured

)

◆ dsa_trigger_status_enable_a()

int dsa_trigger_status_enable_a ( DSA_DRIVE_BASE *  grp,
int  start_line,
int  line_nb,
int  max_missed_element_nb,
ebool  ereport,
DSA_HANDLER  handler,
void *  param 
)

Enable the trigger status (Command:TRS) - asynchronous.

Parameters
grpthe object pointer
start_linethe starting line of event table
line_nbthe number of line to enable
max_missed_element_nbthe maximal element number which can be missed before generating an error (-1 will use the AccurET default)
ereportTRUE if the function must return an error on drive error
handlerthe handler function called when the trigger is enable
paramuser parameter transmitted to the handler function
Returns
a negative value if an error or a timeout has occured
DSA_EACQDEVINUSE One of the device is already doing an acquisition
DSA_EACQNOTPOSSIBLE Drives must be connected with transnet
DSA_EAXESRECOVER Transnet established but axes not recovered
